content: John Peel was not only instrumental in discovering new and emerging talents but also in introducing his listeners to a diverse range of sounds and musical styles. He had a non-judgmental and open-minded approach to music, and his show reflected this by featuring different genres, from indie rock to experimental electronic music, and beyond. As a result, he exposed millions of people to music that they would have otherwise never have heard, and helped broaden their musical horizons. His legacy as a champion of music diversity and innovation continues to inspire many people to explore new sounds and genres, and to keep an open mind when it comes to music.
